Class FlatOpcXmlCreator

  org.docx4j.convert.out.flatOpcXml.FlatOpcXmlCreator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Output
public class FlatOpcXmlCreator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Output

Convert a Package object to org.docx4j.xmlPackage.Package (ie the "pkg" single XML file format, sometimes called Flat OPC format): " (@padding is only on rels) (@compression is only on binary parts)
